Question: 起こす
Comment: to raise; to raise up; to set up

Question: 楽しむ
Comment: to enjoy; to take pleasure in; to have a good time

Question: 近づく
Comment: to approach; to draw near; to get close

Question: 出会う
Comment: to meet (e.g. of rivers, highways, etc.); to emerge and engage (an enemy)

Question: 相変わらず
Comment: as usual; as always; as before

Question: 着く
Comment: to arrive at; to reach; to sit on

Question: 過ごす
Comment: to spend (time); to pass; to lead (a life)

Question: その時
Comment: at that time; at that moment; then

Question: 受け取る
Comment: to receive; to get; to accept

Question: 動かす
Comment: to move; to shift; to stir

Question: 長
Answers: たけ,たき,ちょう,つかさ,おさ,なが

Question: 受け入れる
Comment: to accept; to receive; to agree

Question: 確かめる
Comment: to make sure; to check; to ascertain

Question: その後
Answers: そのあと,そのご,そののち

Question: 乗せる
Comment: to place on (something); to give (someone) a ride; to give a lift

Question: 呼び出す
Comment: to call (someone) to (the door, phone, etc.); to tell (someone) to come; to call up (on the phone)

Question: 少しでも
Comment: even a little; any at all; if only a little
